title: Insta360 One R: GoPro Hero 8 meets the GoPro Max
description: Like Insta360s prior cameras, the Insta360 One R is capable of shooting 360 degrees of footage. But its also a standard 4K action camera. For someone on the fence about taking a full leap into buying a 360 camera, this is the perfect in-between device.
